metadata.description: A crumbling asylum perched on a windswept crag overlooking the city's sprawl. Its walls are adorned with ancient runes that glow like lanterns in the dark, while its halls resound with whispers from the forgotten dead.
metadata.significance: The Argentum Asylum holds the records of Wewew's most disturbed minds, as well as a few secrets best left unspoken. Whispers speak of experiments gone wrong, and the return of an ancient horror.
